name: Animal Speaker
prereq: Ability To Communicate With Some Type Of Animals (Such As Bats Or Arthropods)
summary: You can speak to all animals, not just a particular subset.
description:
You can speak to all animals, not just a particular subset. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Make an Impression on animals (which usually uses the Diplomacy skill).Traits

Sprite: A family of diminutive winged fey with a strong connection to primal magic.
